file_content.text: We'll make the Republic sorry they ever survived the Sacking of Coruscant.
Captain Westro, Forty-second Imperial Infantry. A pleasure to have you for this mission.
I followed Sith into battle during the Sacking of Coruscant. It's an honor to serve you, my lord. Let this fight be equally victorious.
Now begins the final eradication of the Galactic Republic. Once we cripple its people here, we will hunt them to extinction.
This day will be remembered.
We've suffered those vermin long enough.
I witnessed the Sith's power firsthand during the Sacking of Coruscant. I'm privileged to serve you, my lord.
Just so long as we're both aware how lucky you are.
Yes, you are.
I've served with distinction for twenty years. You may rely on me.
I still remember the vital role Imperial Intelligence played in the Sacking of Coruscant. You brought glory to us and terror to our enemies.
We're the first ones into battle and the last ones out.
It's what we do.
I'm honored to serve alongside you.
I served alongside mercenaries like you at the Sacking of Coruscant. With your added strength, we'll return soon to finish the job.
For the right price, I'll follow you into battle anywhere.
As long as I get paid.
Plenty of spoils on Coruscant. I left there with a full cargo crate. Been itching to get back ever since.
We'll win the war together.
It will be an honor to see all of you in action.
If we'd had people like you in our forces during the Sacking of Coruscant, we would've held that planet. Maybe we'll get that chance someday.
I hope we do.
The larger the Empire grows, the closer we come to overpowering our enemy.
The Empire is stronger than ever, its people ready to crush the Republic. My ally here is no exception.
Together, we'll seize victory.
I'll do my best to honor you all, my lord.
Oh, isn't that sweet. You've picked up a not-so-secret admirer.
Someone has a fan.
I am honored to serve you as well, my lord.
My job is easier when I'm unnoticed. My ally ensures I remain an unknown variable.
We do make an excellent team.
I'd never overlook a member of Imperial Intelligence. Glad to have you for this op, agent.
Sometimes I feel left out of this whole Imp party. Then I remember the credits. There are credits?
Some of us came for the money.
This attack is too important to fail. You'll be well paid for its success.
Doesn't every old veteran say they sacked the Republic homeworld?
You fought on Coruscant?
I earned my scars at the Jedi Temple with Darth Malgus. Shot a Jedi in the back. Proudest moment of my life, until today.
Save the flattery. What's the mission?
That's enough sucking up.
Our strike team has infiltrated the Republic's research complex and identified critical objectives. The enemy's forces are strong there.
Your mission is to coordinate with our people, secure the strike team's goals and destroy every Republic combatant in your path. Any questions?
We'll show those Republic fools they have no business on Nar Shaddaa.
None.
Does your strike team know what forces the Republic has in place?
What will we be fighting?
Recon teams report heavy resistance. Elite soldiers, mercenary forces, even Jedi. They'll attack you on sight. Be ready.
I have pressing business elsewhere. How much time will all this Republic bashing take?
How many goals are there?
The enemy's made several major advances. We must neutralize them all, whatever the cost.
One last detail... the Hutts sent one of their droids to monitor Republic activity in the area. When you're done assisting our people, find the droid.
Locate our contacts, wipe out the Republic and find the Hutt droid--got it.
Understood.
What's so special about this droid?
Why?
This droid is tapped into Nar Shaddaa's entire security grid. No telling what details it'll pick up during the battle.
So, scrap the droid with everything else?
Something else to destroy?
Negative. The droid's an important contact. It's gathering useful intel.
Our people await you in the research complex. You have their coordinates. Glory to the Empire!
Excuse me. I'm awaiting orders from my superior.
